task.summary: Load data to list of numpy arrays. Added the column names to the report to later load dataframe with the correct column names.
Added corrected loading and synchronization of sensors in the same device. Saves to csv with correct column names
Added corrected loading and synchronization of sensors in the same device. Saves to csv with correct column names
Added corrected loading and synchronization of sensors in the same device. Saves to csv with correct column names
Synchronization based on cross corr and timestamps done. Working on searching the log for starting times (_get_start_times_from_logger) in Phillip's way.

Added new functions to filter the logger df - remove Sensor data: .... string and Noiserecorder. Changed the _get_logger_start_times function - this function now gets all starting times from the 3 devices. Added a new function _get_used_devices_start_times that gets the start times from the previous function, but only for the used devices.

Finished syncronization based on logger timestamps and the wrapper function. Created a new python package 'visualization' - no code here yet Code works but haven't checked if it's cutting the signals correctly
added visualize_sync.py to visualize the synchronization

Implemented sync_evaluation.py and added to the synchronization function, saving a csv file with the evaluation report. Added _check functions in synchronization.py to check for selected_sensors validity, presence of accelerometer sensor and in_path validity. Implemented unittests to test these "checks". Added missing docstrings. Removed buffer size from watch timestamp in the logger file.
